name: College of Swords
description: Blades are bards who combine martial prowess with bardic magic, dazzling audiences and foes alike.

3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
3.description: You gain proficiency with medium armor and the scimitar, and you can use a simple or martial melee weapon as a spellcasting focus.

3.name: Fighting Style
3.description: Choose a Fighting Style: Dueling or Two-Weapon Fighting.

3.name: Blade Flourish
3.description: When you take the Attack action, your speed increases by 10 feet, and you can expend a Bardic Inspiration to use Defensive, Mobile, or Slashing Flourish.

6.name: Extra Attack
6.description: You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

14.name: Master's Flourish
14.description: Whenever you use a Blade Flourish option, you can roll a d6 instead of expending a Bardic Inspiration die.
